channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rep. Mark Green resigns from Congress, leaving Speaker Johnson with an even narrower Republican majority in the House
item.description: Rep. Mark Green said he was returning to the private sector to start his own business, without sharing details about the business.

item.title: Investors traded a record $6.6 trillion worth of stock in the first half of 2025
Elon Musk says he has formed a new U.S. political party, the 'America Party'
item.description: Elon Musk, the world's richest man, suggests the new party would focus "on just 2 or 3 Senate seats and 8 to 10 House districts."

item.title: Trump's tariffs deadline is looming for Europe. Here's where things stand
item.description: The U.S. and the European Union have not yet struck a trade deal with just days to go before Trump's tariff reprieve is set to end.

item.title: Trump says tariff letters to 12 countries signed, going out Monday
item.description: Trump says tariff letters to 12 countries signed, going out Monday

item.title: The one thing that’s driving home sellers bananas — and making buyers happy
Hamas says it is prepared to talk about Gaza ceasefire proposal
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump earlier announced a "final proposal" for a 60-day ceasefire in the nearly 21-month-old war between Israel and Hamas.

item.title: 5 huge changes coming for student-loan borrowers and colleges under GOP megabill
Will Trump’s megabill cut your taxes? Check this number on your tax return.
Time is running out to buy an EV before Trump’s big bill kills $7,500 tax credit
